title: FlipFace
summary: Minimal Android Wear watchface - This is a very first shot, feedback please!
description: This app is just a carrier for the a simple Android Wear watch face with a few simple goals: • Easy to read • Only use top half of the display to allow notification space • Include battery percentage and day of the week plus date in text form according to watch localeNo frills for now, but that may change...
descriptionHTML:
This app is just a carrier for the a simple Android Wear watch face with a few simple goals:
• Easy to read
• Only use top half of the display to allow notification space
• Include battery percentage and day of the week plus date in text form according to watch locale
No frills for now, but that may change...
comments: Works The date overlaps the clock and the clock face is noticeabley low resolution.  (original lg g watch running 5.0.1)
recentChanges: Better support for watches with resolutions that are not close to my own Moto360.
Thanks go to Дмитрий for testing!
